column4: What do I tell xorg.conf to get higher resolutions on an HDTV?
It depends on combo of vidcard and monitor. If you know the max resolutions both can handle just add them to the xorg.conf file ahead of the highest ones there already.
Well, you will need to restart the x server to see if it takes of course. If not, then you go back and reverse the changes to the xorg.conf
